content.xhtml:p: START light BIT OF THE PROGRAM. THIS IS USED TO LATCH IN THE start light CONTACT IN ORDER TO START THE SEQUENCE OF EVENTS. This only happens if start is pushed, stop and eStop are not press and system is in auto mode. Also if start light is on stop light is off.
Reset LIGHT IS CONTROLED BY THE reset BUTTON. HOLDING THE reset BUTTON FOR LONGER THAN 3 SECONDS WILL reset THE COUNT BACK TO ZERO
This is used to display what step the process is in for the SFC. This is useful in manual or troubleshooting.
When auto is not selected the start button can be used to Jog through the steps. This is for troubleshooting or getting out of errors.

This is the sequential function chart to move the PLC through 7 steps to perform the pick and place machine. This system is built off two reference articles. SeafoxC youtube video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c6XIMz-LL_M for SFC and acc automation pick and place instructuretions https://accautomation.ca/plc-programming-example-pick-and-place/.
KWB 8/9/2023
If start light is on pick and place goes into the auto opperate mode and keeps going till start light is off.
Step 1 starts conveyor belt to bring arm item and keeps exit conveyor to remove previous item.
Step 2 stops conveyor belts when item reaches the entry sensor. Then it moves the arm in Z direction and grabs the device.
Step 3 when arm stops moving in the z direction and an item is detected by the arm sensor. The arm raises in the z direction while grabing the item.
Step 4 when the arm stops lifting inth e z direction and an item is detected and grabbed. The arm moves in the X direction.
Step 5 when the arm stops moving in the X direction, item is detected, and there is not an item in the exit. The arm will start moving in the z direction
Step 6 when the arm stops moving in the z direction, there is an item at the exit. The arm will let go of the item, and move in the upward z direction
Step 7 when the arm stops moving in the upward z direction and the item is at the exit. The arm will then move back to starting position and the exit conveyor will start.
Finally when the item is no longer at the exit and the arm stops moving in the x direction. The process starts over.
